Maven Jenkins Plugin
Last Published: 2013-11-04  | Version: 1.106-SNAPSHOT
Maven Jenkins Plugin
Project Documentation
  • Project Information
  • Project Reports

hpi:insert-test

Full name:

org.jenkins-ci.tools:maven-hpi-plugin:1.106-SNAPSHOT:insert-test

Description:

Insert default test suite.

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Requires dependency resolution of artifacts in scope: test.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: generate-test-sources.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
disabledTestInjection boolean - If true, the automatic test injection will be skipped.
Default value is: false.
User property is: maven-hpi-plugin.disabledTestInjection.
injectedTestName String - Name of the injected test. You may change this to "InjectIT" to get the test running during phase integration-test.
Default value is: InjectedTest.
User property is: maven-hpi-plugin.injectedTestName.
jenkinsCoreId String 1.65 Optional string that represents "groupId:artifactId" of Jenkins core jar. If left unspecified, the default groupId/artifactId pair for Jenkins is looked for.
requirePI boolean - If true, verify that all the jelly scripts have the Jelly XSS PI in them.
User property is: jelly.requirePI.

Parameter Details

disabledTestInjection:

If true, the automatic test injection will be skipped.
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • User Property: maven-hpi-plugin.disabledTestInjection
  • Default: false

injectedTestName:

Name of the injected test. You may change this to "InjectIT" to get the test running during phase integration-test.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: maven-hpi-plugin.injectedTestName
  • Default: InjectedTest

jenkinsCoreId:

Optional string that represents "groupId:artifactId" of Jenkins core jar. If left unspecified, the default groupId/artifactId pair for Jenkins is looked for.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 1.65
  • Required: No

requirePI:

If true, verify that all the jelly scripts have the Jelly XSS PI in them.
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • User Property: jelly.requirePI
